column2: I just had a breast biopsy for cancer. What are the most common types?
Once it breaks out, how likely is it to spread?
How deadly is it?
What? No, I want to know about the deadliness of lobular carcinoma in situ.
Wow, that's better than I thought.  What are common treatments?
How does it behave differently from PLCIS?
What makes lobular cancer distinct?
For the first stage, what are the alternatives to surgery?
No, I meant for lobular.
Does freezing work?
How do I build a cheap driveway?
Which is cheaper: concrete or asphalt?
Really?  What type of product?
Who knew?  Which is more environmentally friendly?
No.  Which type of driveway is better for the environment?
And most low-maintenance?
Really? What about asphalt?
Is sealing worth it?
How can fires help an ecosystem?
Give me some examples.
Cool name!  What are other fire-followers?
Let’s talk about other environmental influences besides fire. More broadly, what are the effects of agriculture?
Can it cause desertification?
What does it mean to be tired?
That sounds like organic farming.  How are they related?
Does organic farming reduce global warming, and if so, how?
Why do cats eat plastic?
Will it kill him?
What?  No.  Will eating plastic kill my cat?
How do I get him to stop?
Should I get a second one?
What are his desires?
What does the slow blink mean?
What are the benefits of cow milk?
What about an alternative. I’ve heard it's also made from almonds?
Which is healthiest?
No, the vegan ones. Which of those alternatives is healthiest?
Can I make it at home?
Oat seems popular now.  Why?
I’m going to bake some cookies. Which one would be the best to use?
What would be second best?
What is the best in my morning latte?
I didn’t expect that. Really, hemp? Say more.
I saw a Tesla Roadster today which made me wonder, what is the world’s fastest car?
What is the first based on?
How fast can the unmodified base car go?
No, I meant the Lotus.
Can any go over 300 mph?
What is the origin of funny cars? Why do they call them that?
How fast did it go?
No, I meant the funny car.  But, that’s interesting. I heard it has a ludicrous mode. How does its quickness compare to the Venom?
It sounds like the Tesla is very competitive.  What makes its engine unique compared with gas ones?
I heard they’ve been working on something even faster.
Is the Roadster related to the other super cars we’ve talked about?
What’s the history of steroid use in sports in the US?
What were Ziegler’s improvements?
Why are they banned?
Are there visible signs?
That sounds easy to spot.  How do they get away with it?
What is the NFL policy?
Isn’t that speed?
What is the difference between the two policies?
I heard it even affects card players. Didn't bridge also have a problem?
I know what bridge is. I heard there was a drug scandal recently.
Does the article have more about it?
How do genes work?
What other diseases are caused by a single change?
What are the other types of diseases?
You missed the second type of disease.  What was that?
That’s not what I wanted. How about recent developments in gene therapy to treat those defects?
What are they worried about?
No, I meant in humans.
It sounds like it could be used in many places. What other types of organisms has it been tried on?
I’ve heard a lot about RNA recently. Can it be used to edit that too?
What’s the difference between the types you mentioned?
That’s too basic, I’d like a more scientific explanation.
The developments sound exciting. What are the commercial issues using it?
What are the alternatives to avoid licensing issues?
I’m a runner and I’ve been feeling tired. My doctor said my ferritin count is slightly low. What should I do next?
How about my diet, what should I consider changing?
No, I meant to help my ferritin specifically.
What is the difference between the two types?
I’m vegetarian. So, what can I do to improve it and increase my levels?
I heard eating eggs might help.
I’m also a woman over 50. How many do I need to eat to get the recommended amount?
I’m starting to train for a marathon, what should I consider?
No, I’m starting to train for a marathon, what is a one week diet?
How are mental health disorders perceived and addressed around the world?
What are the causes of stigma in Africa?
Could you expand on some of these methods?
How effective are these methods and could they be combined with Western medicine?
Okay. Now, what about the causes in Asia?
Is there a relationship between these values and mental illness in the region?
Wow. Besides these values, what other factors could cause stigmatization?
What about the causes in North America?
Hmm. What has the Alliance done to help?
I found the Indian student's approach to treating depression interesting. Have their approaches been tried elsewhere?
Can you tell me more about Chibanda's approach? How effective has it been?
How are literary devices used in Biblical poetry?
That's interesting. How is it defined?
How did those traditions affect them?
That's interesting about Christianity. How are devices used in Islamic ones?
Okay. How does the use of rhyme in Biblical poetry compare?
Why didn't it use rhymes as much?
Ahh, it seems like rhyming and parallelism share similar functions. How did both types of poetry influence other kinds of poetry?
Did Biblical poetry have a similar impact?
A friend said there were massive protests in Nigeria towards the end of 2020. What happened?
Why was the Squad established in the first place?
What's an example of those reasons?
How did the international community respond?
Okay, but I meant their response to the EndSars protests.
Did that help?
My friend also mentioned that women were instrumental to the movement. What was their role?
That's cool. Tell me more about them.
There was mention of the protection of Black lives earlier. How is it related to this movement?
What role did women play in that?
I like fashion and animals. What career options should I consider?
Becoming a fashion designer sounds interesting. What's the job outlook?
How can I get a degree in it?
Okay. What does the portfolio usually consist of?
What are the common entry requirements for the degree?
I’ll consider those. How about my options for my other interest?
Not quite. I want to know about career opportunities related to animals.
How do I become a vet?
What are the other steps?
I understand that licenses are required. Tell me more about that.
What about a way to combine both of my interests?
My dog has been shaking and tilting its head a lot recently. What could be wrong?
I just checked and there’s swelling in the outer portion. What could it be?
How dangerous could these be?
I live in a remote area. How can I treat it at home?
My cat is also having similar symptoms. Would that work for her as well?
Thanks. I am also worried that they are susceptible to the coronavirus.
Okay, but I also heard that a few have been reported to be infected.
How can I protect them?
Ok. But what about my dog?
Why did Michael Jackson go so far to alter his appearance?
What else was it about?
Okay. Did the diet help?
Never mind. Tell me more about the Pepsi commercial.
How so?
Okay. How did it affect his art and legacy?
I remember there was a global coffee shortage some time ago. Can you tell me more about that?
What caused the drought?
I also heard that other Latin American countries had coffee production issues. Was the disruption widespread?
It sounds like they are not related. What are its origins? And how did it spread?
Okay. The US government tried to help the situation. What did they do to help?
No, I want to know what they did to help with the coffee rust epidemic in Latin America.
Okay. What did big coffee companies do? How did they try to help?
How did all these affect global consumption?
That’s interesting, consumption is not very elastic. Would investing in it make sense?
I heard Bernie Sanders was ill recently. What happened?
What did the doctors do?
How did it affect the campaign?
How did he attempt to regain the public's confidence?
Okay. What did the records say?
Okay, I'd like to know more about his decision.
What about the other candidates? Did they release theirs?
Should there be an age limit on the presidency?
I'm about to become a dad and I want to get fit before it gets too hard. How do I get started?
Okay. Should I try CrossFit?
That sounds very intense but useful for me. How does it compare with just weightlifting?
I would rather be safe. Do the positives outweigh the negatives?
I’ve got four weeks. What about cardio?
Okay. What role will diet play?
What other meal frequencies can I try?
Which one’s better?
Okay. I would eventually like to spend time with my baby while working out too. Do you have any ideas for that?
I just watched the first Jurassic Park movie and I got interested in dinosaurs and their time on earth. Can you tell me about the time when dinosaurs actually existed?
Hmm. What else was characteristic about that era?
Can you tell me more about the fossil records and the theory?
What was it like during the time dinosaurs were on earth?
That's really cool. Could such a continent form again?
Okay. You mentioned three periods in the Dinosaur era. What was characteristic about the first one?
What about the second?
And the last?
What happened to dinosaurs after then?
How do the evolution of dinosaurs across the three periods compare?
That's interesting. How scientifically accurate was the movie?
I’d like to learn more about frogs. What’s the biggest one?
What's been done to protect them?
Has that been effective?
How can I help?
Okay, that’s the biggest.  What is the smallest?
Why would leaf litter affect its size?
I want to go on vacation somewhere in Europe with good food. What are some beautiful places?
Yes, it'll be my first time. Where should I consider?
What should I not miss on the Coast?
What food is it known for?
Duomo?  What’s that?
Cool!  What kinds of innovations?
Why is it important to reduce runoff in urban areas?
What practices could I use at home to help?
Maybe I could collect it for my garden. I’d like to learn more about using a barrel.  What should I consider?
I live in Seattle and have a big lawn. How big should it be? How much can I save?
That sounds like a lot of water. How big are normal barrels? And what material should I get? What are the pros and cons of different materials?
Is it safe to use on my garden?
What else should I consider when installing it?
You also mentioned rain gardens earlier. How do they compare?
I’ll try the garden too. What are some native plants for my area that I could use?
What’s the science behind why we drink alcohol?
What are the causes of it?
Who is at high risk?
What is a safe amount to drink daily?
What do the guidelines say for pregnant women? Why?
But I’ve heard that pregnant women in France drink wine with dinner. Is that true?
So you mean that the US suggestion may be too strict? What is the French government's attitude?
Tell me about the findings from the Lancet study you mentioned. What advice did it give for safety?
I’d like to stop. What are some treatment options?
No, I meant drinking alcohol. What are some rehab treatment options to consider?
What are the mechanisms of depression?
What is the role of serotonin?
How can I balance it?
What foods boost it?
How does the phenylalanine convert to tyrosine?
Can these drugs alleviate depression?
Does this theory explain the cause of depression?
Can a person have both at the same time?
No, I meant mania and depression.
What are the types of bipolar?
Who are the greatest catchers of all time?
What was he known for?
Who won his award?
Who was the next Rookie of the Year for the team after him?
Did Bench make it into Cooperstown?
Was he married?
I’d like to know about the first two marriages.
Does Bobby play baseball?
Interesting. How old was he when they got divorced?
I saw an online ad for a house with descriptions saying it has a heat pump. What is that?
What are some other choices to heat my home?
What are the pros and cons between a gas furnace and a heat pump?
A heat pump seems very suitable for my house. How much does it cost to install one?
Which type is better in terms of efficiency?
How many years will it take to recoup the investment?
That’s great. What makes it so efficient?
Cool science. But I’ve heard some horror stories about air-source ones.
Tell me about AC systems.
How is it different from a heat pump?
